resources.string: If you have a device with /system partition write-protected (e.g. some HTC devices), please use RECOVERY METHOD \n\nIn case recovery method can\'t reboot your device AUTOMATICALLY, please REBOOT TO RECOVERY yourself
Unable to reboot automatically, please reboot to recovery to finish installation
Error: couldn\'t write to app directory, no free space?
Error: couldn\'t mount system paritition writable
Error: couldn\'t write recovery data, not enough space in cache partition? \nTry clearing cache in recovery first and try again
